In consequence of these words a difference of opinion again arose among the people.
Many of them said, “He is possessed by a demon and is mad; why do you listen to him?”
Others said, “This is not the teaching of one who is possessed by a demon. Can a demon give sight to the blind?”
Soon after this the Festival of the Rededication was held at Jerusalem.
It was winter; and Jesus was walking in the Temple Courts, in the Colonnade of Solomon,
when the people gathered around him, and said, “How long are you going to keep us in suspense? If you are the Christ, tell us so frankly.”

“\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w told|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w so|strong="G2532"\+w*,”replied Jesus, “\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*. \+w The|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w doing|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*’s \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w bears|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w testimony|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*.

and seeing this, Jesus said, “\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w done|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w before|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w your|strong="G1223"\+w* eyes \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w actions|strong="G2041"\+w*, \+w inspired|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* would \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w stone|strong="G3034"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*?”

The authorities again sought to arrest him; but he escaped their hands.
Then Jesus again crossed the Jordan to the place where John used to baptize at first, and stayed there some time, during which many people came to see him.
“John gave no sign of his mission,” they said. “But everything that he said about this man was true.”
And many learned to believe in Jesus there.
